```{r load_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE} 
library(dplyr)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

### Week 1 Overview

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "#4682b4"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-square", fill = "#4682b4"))

wk_post <- tibble(
"eCampus" = c(unchecked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked,
              checked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked),

"Slack" = c(unchecked,
            unchecked,
            unchecked,
            unchecked,
            checked,
            unchecked),

Description = c("Introduce yourself in Slack under `#introduce-yourself`",
                "Verify your Qualtrics account",
                "Complete modules in Data Camp that address the basic elements of R and tidying data.",
                "Think about a population to test",
                "Create a post apiece about a Sims study and evaluation verses research",
                "Review some literature about program evaluations and introductory materials on measurement"),

Location = c("[Link](/tasks/01-task/#class-slack-account-access)",
             "[Link](/tasks/01-task/#verify-qualtrics-account-login)",
             "[Link](/datacamp/01-module/)",
             "[Link](/tasks/01-tasks/#think-about-assessment)",
             "[Link](/readings/01-readings/#read-some-papers)",
             "[Link](/readings/01-readings/#review-some-texts)")

)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
kable(wk_post, 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'cclc') %>% 
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "30em") %>%
  column_spec(4, width = "10em") %>%
  row_spec(0, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;') %>%
  row_spec(1, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;') %>%
  row_spec(2, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;') 
```
